data.name: Aierlon
data.detailed_description: You are chosen to compete in the Trials of the gods, a gauntlet of challenges for this puzzle platformer deep inside a Mesopotamian temple. You play as one of the champions armed with a bow and the gifts of the god Nuzion. Using your wit, platforming, creative thinking, problem-solving, and exploration skills progress through each increasingly difficult challenge in order to claim leadership for your god. Use your arrows to break targets and reveal exit doors, drop hidden platforms to solve puzzles, and use your platforming skills to quickly navigate fast-breaking platforms before perishing in the abyss below. Only one champion ever emerges from the temple. Will you be that champion? Or will you disappear deep inside the temple never to be seen again? Trust is the key.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
